name: ADAPALENE

indications.text: adapalene gel , 0.3 % indicated topical treatment acne vulgaris patients 12 years age older .

contraindications.text: wash affected areas gently non-medicated soap . apply thin film adapalene gel entire face affected areas skin daily evening . avoid application areas skin around eyes , lips , mucous membranes . mild transitory sensation warmth slight stinging may occur shortly application adapalene gel . instruct patients minimize sun exposure moisturizers relief dry skin irritation . therapeutic results noticed 12 weeks treatment , therapy re-evaluated . topical . ophthalmic , oral intravaginal .

warningsAndPrecautions: adapalene gel usp , 0.3 % supplied following size . 15 g tube – ndc 46708-549-15 45 g tube – ndc 46708-549-45 45 g pump – ndc 46708-549-46 storage : store controlled room temperature 68° 77°f ( 20° 25°c ) excursions permitted 59° 86°f ( 15° 30°c ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . protect freezing . keep reach children .
adverseReactions: adapalene gel contraindicated patients known hypersensitivity adapalene excipient adapalene gel [ ( 5.1 ) ] .
indications_original: Adapalene gel, 0.3% is indicated for the topical treatment of acne vulgaris in patients 12 years of age and older.
contraindications_original:
Wash affected areas gently with a non-medicated soap. Apply a thin film of adapalene gel to the entire face and any other affected areas of the skin once daily in the evening. Avoid application to the areas of skin around eyes, lips, and mucous membranes. A mild transitory sensation of warmth or slight stinging may occur shortly after the application of adapalene gel.  
                  Instruct patients to minimize sun exposure and to use moisturizers for relief of dry skin or irritation. 
                  If therapeutic results are not noticed after 12 weeks of treatment, therapy should be re-evaluated.  
                  For topical use only. Not for ophthalmic, oral or intravaginal use.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Adapalene gel USP, 0.3% is supplied in the following size.
                  15 g tube – NDC 46708-549-15
                  45 g tube – NDC 46708-549-45
                  45 g pump – NDC 46708-549-46
                  
                     
                        Storage
                     
                     : Store at controlled room temperature 68° to 77°F (20° to 25°C) with excursions permitted between 59° to 86°F (15° to 30°C) [See USP Controlled Room Temperature]. Protect from freezing. Keep out of reach of children.
adverseReactions_original: Adapalene gel is contraindicated in patients who have known hypersensitivity to adapalene or any excipient of adapalene gel [see WARNINGS AND PRECAUTIONS (5.1)].
